cs.CR, cs.IT, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the problem of securing distributed storage systems against eavesdropping and adversarial attacks, which is a central topic in the field of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also discusses the repair mechanism in dynamic settings, which involves coding theory and information theory (cs.IT). The paper focuses on distributed storage systems, which is a subfield of distributed computing (cs.DC) and distributed systems (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the identification and removal of malicious nodes, which is a topic in network security (cs.SI).
